original: @16b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du

original: n'a ma sangg'i ti s'a dha nam /
analyzed: na ma sangg ti sa dha nam

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag ba rjod ba sgrub thabs

original: ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag tshal lo

original: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos snga bar langs te kha la sogs pa dag par bya ste /
analyzed: dang po re jig sgrub ba pos snga ba ldang te kha la sogs ba dag ba byed ste

original: bsam gtan gyi khang par rab tu zhugs nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi khang ba rab tu jug nas

original: bde ba'i stan la skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas la /
analyzed: bde ba stan la skyil mo krung gis nye ba gnas la

original: snying gar padma dang zla ba la dmar zhing dkar ba'i mu:yig bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: snying gar padma dang zla ba la dmar zhing dkar ba mu:yig bsgom ba byed

original: de nas de'i 'od zer de'i tshogs lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyis bkug ste /
analyzed: de nas de d zer de tshogs lcags kyu rnam ba can gyis gugs ste

original: bcom ldan 'das 'og nas 'byung ba'i mdog dang / zhal dang / phyag mtshan dang / gdan dang / nye bar ldan pa mdun du rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: joms ldan da g nas byung ba mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan dang gdan dang nye ba ldan ba mdun du rnam ba sgom la

original: yid kyis rang bzhin gyi me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: yid kyis rang bzhin gyi me tog dang bdug ba la sogs ba yang dag ba mchod la

original: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa thams cad byas shing byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de mdun du sdig ba chags ba la sogs ba thams cad byed shing byams ba la sogs ba tshangs ba gnas bzhi rnam ba sgom nas

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon du bya ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong ba nyid du mngon du byed ste

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&amp ;
analyzed: aom shu n+ya ta dznya na badzra sva bha wa aatma ko&amp

original: ham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: ham zhes byed ba sngags kyis byin gyis brlab ba byed

original: de nas nam mkha' la h'um gis rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha la hum gis rdo rje rtse lnga ba sa bon dang cha ba rnam ba sgom la

original: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis ji lta ba'i sbyor bas rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur dang / sa 'og kun rdo rje'i sa gzhir dmigs la rdo rje yang 'od zer du gyur nas rdo rje'i rab las phyi rol tu phyogs bcing pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar gnas par blta'o //
analyzed: de d zer rnams kyis ji lta ba sbyor ba rdo rje ra ba dang rdo rje gur dang sa g kun rdo rje sa gzhir dmigs la rdo rje yang d zer du gyur nas rdo rje rab las phyi rol tu phyogs ching ba la sogs ba gzugs kyis nye ba gnas ba lta

original: de'i rjes su rdo rjer ba'i nad du hr'i:yongs su gyur pa las padma'o //
analyzed: de rjes su rdo rjer ba nad du hr:yongs su gyur ba las padma

original: padma'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: padma steng du aa las zla ba dkyil khor ro

original: de'i steng du dkar dmar gyi mu:yig la sangs rgyas mang po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: de steng du dkar dmar gyi mu:yig la sangs rgya mang po spro ba dang sdud ba rnam ba sgom la

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dmar zhing dkar ba padma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur ba las rje btsun jam ba dbyangs dmar zhing dkar ba padma dang zla ba steng na rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba

original: zhal dang po dmar po g-yas sngon po g-yon dkar po zhes bya ba'i zhal gsum pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: zhal dang po dmar po g-yas sngon po g-yon dkar po zhes byed ba zhal gsum ba bsgom mo

original: phyag bzhin ji lta ba'i sbyor bas shes rab kyi po ti dang ral gri dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: phyag bzhin ji lta ba sbyor ba shes rab kyi po ti dang ral gri dang gzhu dang mda dang ldan ba so

original: rin po che'i dbu rgyan mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa /
analyzed: rin po che dbu rgyan mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam ba mdzes ba

original: gzhon zhing gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par bdag nyid bsgoms la /
analyzed: gzhon zhing gzhon nu rgyan gyis rnam ba rgyan ba bdag nyid sgom la

original: @17a * // snying gar padma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje sems ma dkar mo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: snying gar padma dang zla ba steng du rdo rje sems ma dkar mo sems dpa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba

original: g-yon na dril bu dkur brten cing 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon na dril bu dkur rten cing chang ba

original: g-yas pa na rang gi snying gar 'degs par byed pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje 'chang ba smin mtshams su de bzhin du rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba 'ching zhing nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas ba na rang gi snying gar degs ba byed ba sbyor ba rdo rje chang ba smin mtshams su de bzhin du rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba ching zhing nye ba gnas ba

original: mgrin par padma rdo rje ma dmar zhing dkar ba /
analyzed: mgrin ba padma rdo rje ma dmar zhing dkar ba

original: g-yon pas padma'i sdong bu 'gying bag dang bcas pa bzung ba /
analyzed: g-yon ba padma sdong bu gying bag dang cha ba bzung ba

original: g-yas pas de'i 'dab ma kha 'byed cing sngon bzhin du de nyid nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas ba de dab ma kha byed cing sngon bzhin du de nyid nye ba gnas ba

original: spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma sku mdog ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor 'chang zhing de kho na bzhin du nye bar gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma sku mdog ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum ba dang ldan ba phyag gnyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor chang zhing de kho na bzhin du nye ba gnas ba bsgom ba byed

original: aom badzra aangku sha dza:aom badzra p'a sha h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra aangku sha dza:aom badzra pa sha hum

original: aom badzra spho ta bam /
analyzed: aom badzra spho ta bam

original: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:zhes pa'i sngags kyis padma dang zla ba'i steng du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra aa be sha ho:zhes ba sngags kyis padma dang zla ba steng du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes kyi khor lo gugs ba dang jug ba dang ching ba dang dbang du byed

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te mdzub mo dang / mthe'u chung lcags sgrog du byas shing sprad pa bkan te rang gi kha ru nye bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ching te mdzub mo dang mtheu chung lcags sgrog du byed shing sprod ba bkan te rang gi kha ru nye ba jog ba ni rdo rje khor lo phyag rgya ste

original: aargham dang zhal bsil dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la skad cig gis rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: aargham dang zhal bsil dang me tog dang bdug ba la sogs ba yang dag ba mchod la skad cig gis rang gi lus la jug ba byed

original: de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de rjes su de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyis bdag la dbang skur ba sngon du gro ba

original: mi bskyod pas bdag nyid kyi dbu brgyan par rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: mi skyod ba bdag nyid kyi dbu rgyan ba rnam ba bsams la

analyzed: aom sarba dharma aa bha ba sva bha wa bi shuddha

analyzed: badzra tsakshu:aa aa aam aa:pra kri ti ba ri shuddha:sarba dharma ya du ta

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhi ta /
analyzed: sarba ta tha ga ta dznya na ka ya manydzu shr ba ri shuddhi ta

original: mu p'a d'a ya ti /
analyzed: mu pa da ya ti

original: aa a'a:sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
analyzed: aa aa:sarba ta tha ga ta hri da ya

original: ha ra ha ra /
analyzed: ha ra ha ra

original: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga w'an /
analyzed: aom hum hr:bha ga wan

original: dzny'a na m'urti /
analyzed: dznya na murti

original: b'a g'i shva ra /
analyzed: ba g shva ra

original: ma h'a p'a tsa /
analyzed: ma ha pa tsa

original: sarba dharm'a / ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
analyzed: sarba dharma ga ga na aa ma la su ba ri shuddha

original: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dang po dang / bar ma dang / mthar byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: dharma dha tu dznya na garbha aa:zhes byed ba sngags kyis dang po dang ba ma dang mthar byin gyis brlab ba sngon du gro ba

original: rje btsun mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyi ma re re zhing so so'i thun mtshams su lan gsum mam lan gcig tu skyil mo krung ma zhig par mnyam par gzhag par bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: rje btsun mtshan yang dag ba rjod ba nyi ma re re zhing so so thun mtshams su lan gsum mam lan gcig tu skyil mo krung ma jig ba mnyam ba jog ba klog ba byed

original: de @17b ltar ji srid grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong bar de srid bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ji srid grub ba mtshan ma mthong ba de srid klog ba byed

analyzed: de rjes su brgyud ji lta ba bzhin dngos grub kyi thabs la rjes su gnas ba byed

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: mtshan yang dag ba rjod ba sgrub thabs rdzogs so

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang ba ri lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang ba ri lo tsa ba sgyur ba
